013package org.apache.juneau.config.internal;
014
015import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.StringUtils.*;
016import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.ThrowableUtils.*;
017import static org.apache.juneau.common.utils.Utils.*;
018import static org.apache.juneau.config.event.ConfigEventType.*;
019import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.*;
020import static org.apache.juneau.internal.CollectionUtils.map;
021
022import java.io.*;
023import java.util.*;
024import java.util.concurrent.*;
025import java.util.stream.*;
026
027import org.apache.juneau.*;
028import org.apache.juneau.collections.*;
029import org.apache.juneau.common.utils.*;
030import org.apache.juneau.config.event.*;
031import org.apache.juneau.config.store.*;
032import org.apache.juneau.internal.*;
033
034/**
035 * Represents the parsed contents of a configuration.
036 */
037public class ConfigMap implements ConfigStoreListener {
038
039   private final ConfigStore store;         // The store that created this object.
040   private volatile String contents;        // The original contents of this object.
041   final String name;                       // The name  of this object.
042
043   // Changes that have been applied since the last load.
044   private final List<ConfigEvent> changes = synced(new ConfigEvents());
045
046   // Registered listeners listening for changes during saves or reloads.
047   private final Set<ConfigEventListener> listeners = synced(Utils.set());
048
049   // The parsed entries of this map with all changes applied.
050   final Map<String,ConfigSection> entries = synced(map());
051
052   // The original entries of this map before any changes were applied.
053   final Map<String,ConfigSection> oentries = synced(map());
054
055   // Import statements in this config.
056   final List<Import> imports = new CopyOnWriteArrayList<>();
057
058   private final SimpleReadWriteLock lock = new SimpleReadWriteLock();
059
060   /**
061    * Constructor.
062    *
063    * @param store The config store.
064    * @param name The config name.
065    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
066    */
067   public ConfigMap(ConfigStore store, String name) throws IOException {
068      this.store = store;
069      this.name = name;
070      load(store.read(name));
071   }
072
073   ConfigMap(ConfigStore store, String name, String contents) throws IOException {
074      this.store = store;
075      this.name = name;
076      load(contents);
077   }
078
079   private ConfigMap load(String contents) throws IOException {
080      if (contents == null)
081         contents = "";
082      this.contents = contents;
083
084      entries.clear();
085      oentries.clear();
086      imports.forEach(Import::unregisterAll);
087      imports.clear();
088
089      var imports2 = mapOf(String.class, ConfigMap.class);
090
091      List<String> lines = new LinkedList<>();
092      try (var scanner = new Scanner(contents)) {
093         while (scanner.hasNextLine()) {
094            var line = scanner.nextLine();
095            var c = firstChar(line);
096            var c2 = StringUtils.lastNonWhitespaceChar(line);
097            if (c == '[') {
098               var l = line.trim();
099               if (c2 != ']' || ! isValidNewSectionName(l.substring(1, l.length()-1)))
100                  throw new ConfigException("Invalid section name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
101            } else if (c == '<') {
102               var l = line.trim();
103               var i = l.indexOf('>');
104               if (i != -1) {
105                  var l2 = l.substring(1, i);
106                  if (! isValidConfigName(l2))
107                     throw new ConfigException("Invalid import config name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
108                  var l3 = l.substring(i+1);
109                  if (! (Utils.isEmpty(l3) || firstChar(l3) == '#'))
110                     throw new ConfigException("Invalid import config name found in configuration:  {0}", line);
111                  var importName = l2.trim();
112                  try {
113                     if (! imports2.containsKey(importName))
114                        imports2.put(importName, store.getMap(importName));
115                  } catch (StackOverflowError e) {
116                     throw new IOException("Import loop detected in configuration '"+name+"'->'"+importName+"'");
117                  }
118               }
119            }
120            lines.add(line);
121         }
122      }
123
124      List<Import> irl = Utils.listOfSize(imports2.size());
125      forEachReverse(listFrom(imports2.values()), x -> irl.add(new Import(x).register(listeners)));
126      this.imports.addAll(irl);
127
128      // Add [blank] section.
129      var inserted = false;
130      var foundComment = false;
131      for (var li = lines.listIterator(); li.hasNext();) {
132         var l = li.next();
133         var c = firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
134         if (c != '#') {
135            if (c == 0 && foundComment) {
136               li.set("[]");
137               inserted = true;
138            }
139            break;
140         }
141         foundComment = true;
142      }
143      if (! inserted)
144         lines.add(0, "[]");
145
146      // Collapse any multi-lines.
147      var li = lines.listIterator(lines.size());
148      String accumulator = null;
149      while (li.hasPrevious()) {
150         var l = li.previous();
151         var c = firstChar(l);
152         if (c == '\t') {
153            c = firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
154            if (c != '#') {
155               if (accumulator == null)
156                  accumulator = l.substring(1);
157               else
158                  accumulator = l.substring(1) + "\n" + accumulator;  // NOSONAR - Intentionally not using StringBuilder.
159               li.remove();
160            }
161         } else if (accumulator != null) {
162            li.set(l + "\n" + accumulator);
163            accumulator = null;
164         }
165      }
166
167      lines = copyOf(lines);
168      var last = lines.size()-1;
169
170      final int
171         S1 = 1, // Looking for section.
172         S2 = 2; // Found section, looking for start.
173
174      var state = S1;
175
176      var sections = listOf(ConfigSection.class);
177
178      for (var i = last; i >= 0; i--) {
179         var l = lines.get(i);
180         var c = firstChar(l);
181
182         if (state == S1) {
183            if (c == '[') {
184               state = S2;
185            }
186         } else {
187            if (c != '#' && (c == '[' || l.indexOf('=') != -1)) {
188               sections.add(new ConfigSection(lines.subList(i+1, last+1)));
189               last = i + 1;
190               state = (c == '[' ? S2 : S1);
191            }
192         }
193      }
194
195      sections.add(new ConfigSection(lines.subList(0, last+1)));
196
197      for (var i = sections.size() - 1; i >= 0; i--) {
198         var cs = sections.get(i);
199         if (entries.containsKey(cs.name))
200            throw new ConfigException("Duplicate section found in configuration:  [{0}]", cs.name);
201         entries.put(cs.name, cs);
202       }
203
204      oentries.putAll(entries);
205      return this;
206   }
207
208   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
209   // Getters
210   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
211
212   /**
213    * Reads an entry from this map.
214    *
215    * @param section
216    *    The section name.
217    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
218    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
219    * @param key
220    *    The entry key.
221    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
222    * @return The entry, or <jk>null</jk> if the entry doesn't exist.
223    */
224   public ConfigMapEntry getEntry(String section, String key) {
225      checkSectionName(section);
226      checkKeyName(key);
227      try (var x = lock.read()) {
228         var cs = entries.get(section);
229         var ce = cs == null ? null : cs.entries.get(key);
230
231         if (ce == null)
232            ce = imports.stream().map(y -> y.getConfigMap().getEntry(section, key)).filter(y -> y != null).findFirst().orElse(null);
233
234         return ce;
235      }
236   }
237
238   /**
239    * Returns the pre-lines on the specified section.
240    *
241    * <p>
242    * The pre-lines are all lines such as blank lines and comments that preceed a section.
243    *
244    * @param section
245    *    The section name.
246    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
247    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
248    * @return
249    *    An unmodifiable list of lines, or <jk>null</jk> if the section doesn't exist.
250    */
251   public List<String> getPreLines(String section) {
252      checkSectionName(section);
253      try (var x = lock.read()) {
254         var cs = entries.get(section);
255         return cs == null ? null : cs.preLines;
256      }
257   }
258
259   /**
260    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
261    *
262    * @return
263    *    An unmodifiable set of keys.
264    */
265   public Set<String> getSections() {
266      var s = imports.isEmpty() ? entries.keySet() : setOf(String.class);
267      if (! imports.isEmpty()) {
268         imports.forEach(x -> s.addAll(x.getConfigMap().getSections()));
269         s.addAll(entries.keySet());
270      }
271      return u(s);
272   }
273
274   /**
275    * Returns the keys of the entries in the specified section.
276    *
277    * @param section
278    *    The section name.
279    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
280    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
281    * @return
282    *    An unmodifiable set of keys, or an empty set if the section doesn't exist.
283    */
284   public Set<String> getKeys(String section) {
285      checkSectionName(section);
286      var cs = entries.get(section);
287      var s = imports.isEmpty() && cs != null ? cs.entries.keySet() : Utils.<String>set();
288      if (! imports.isEmpty()) {
289         imports.forEach(x -> s.addAll(x.getConfigMap().getKeys(section)));
290         if (cs != null)
291            s.addAll(cs.entries.keySet());
292      }
293      return u(s);
294   }
295
296   /**
297    * Returns <jk>true</jk> if this config has the specified section.
298    *
299    * @param section
300    *    The section name.
301    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
302    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
303    * @return <jk>true</jk> if this config has the specified section.
304    */
305   public boolean hasSection(String section) {
306      checkSectionName(section);
307      return entries.get(section) != null || imports.stream().anyMatch(x -> x.getConfigMap().hasSection(section));
308   }
309
310   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
311   // Setters
312   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
313
314   /**
315    * Adds a new section or replaces the pre-lines on an existing section.
316    *
317    * @param section
318    *    The section name.
319    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
320    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
321    * @param preLines
322    *    The pre-lines on the section.
323    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
324    * @return This object.
325    */
326   public ConfigMap setSection(String section, List<String> preLines) {
327      checkSectionName(section);
328      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.setSection(name, section, preLines));
329   }
330
331   /**
332    * Adds or overwrites an existing entry.
333    *
334    * @param section
335    *    The section name.
336    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
337    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
338    * @param key
339    *    The entry key.
340    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
341    * @param value
342    *    The entry value.
343    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
344    * @param modifiers
345    *    Optional modifiers.
346    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
347    * @param comment
348    *    Optional comment.
349    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
350    * @param preLines
351    *    Optional pre-lines.
352    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, the previous value will not be overwritten.
353    * @return This object.
354    */
355   public ConfigMap setEntry(String section, String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
356      checkSectionName(section);
357      checkKeyName(key);
358      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, section, key, value, modifiers, comment, preLines));
359   }
360
361
362   /**
363    * Not implemented.
364    *
365    * @param section
366    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
367    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
368    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
369    * @param importName
370    *    The import name.
371    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
372    * @param preLines
373    *    Optional comment and blank lines to add immediately before the import statement.
374    *    <br>If <jk>null</jk>, previous pre-lines will not be replaced.
375    * @return This object.
376    */
377   public ConfigMap setImport(String section, String importName, List<String> preLines) {
378      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented.");
379   }
380
381   /**
382    * Removes a section.
383    *
384    * <p>
385    * This eliminates all entries in the section as well.
386    *
387    * @param section
388    *    The section name.
389    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
390    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
391    * @return This object.
392    */
393   public ConfigMap removeSection(String section) {
394      checkSectionName(section);
395      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.removeSection(name, section));
396   }
397
398   /**
399    * Removes an entry.
400    *
401    * @param section
402    *    The section name.
403    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
404    *    <br>Use blank to refer to the default section.
405    * @param key
406    *    The entry key.
407    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
408    * @return This object.
409    */
410   public ConfigMap removeEntry(String section, String key) {
411      checkSectionName(section);
412      checkKeyName(key);
413      return applyChange(true, ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, section, key));
414   }
415
416   /**
417    * Not implemented.
418    *
419    * @param section
420    *    The section name where to place the import statement.
421    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
422    *    <br>Use blank for the default section.
423    * @param importName
424    *    The import name.
425    *    <br>Must not be <jk>null</jk>.
426    * @return This object.
427    */
428   public ConfigMap removeImport(String section, String importName) {
429      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not implemented.");
430   }
431
432   private ConfigMap applyChange(boolean addToChangeList, ConfigEvent ce) {
433      if (ce == null)
434         return this;
435      try (var x = lock.write()) {
436         var section = ce.getSection();
437         var cs = entries.get(section);
438         if (ce.getType() == SET_ENTRY) {
439            if (cs == null) {
440               cs = new ConfigSection(section);
441               entries.put(section, cs);
442            }
443            var oe = cs.entries.get(ce.getKey());
444            if (oe == null)
445               oe = ConfigMapEntry.NULL;
446            cs.addEntry(
447               ce.getKey(),
448               ce.getValue() == null ? oe.value : ce.getValue(),
449               ce.getModifiers() == null ? oe.modifiers : ce.getModifiers(),
450               ce.getComment() == null ? oe.comment : ce.getComment(),
451               ce.getPreLines() == null ? oe.preLines : ce.getPreLines()
452            );
453         } else if (ce.getType() == SET_SECTION) {
454            if (cs == null) {
455               cs = new ConfigSection(section);
456               entries.put(section, cs);
457            }
458            if (ce.getPreLines() != null)
459               cs.setPreLines(ce.getPreLines());
460         } else if (ce.getType() == REMOVE_ENTRY) {
461            if (cs != null)
462               cs.entries.remove(ce.getKey());
463         } else if (ce.getType() == REMOVE_SECTION) {
464            if (cs != null)  // NOSONAR - Intentional.
465               entries.remove(section);
466         }
467         if (addToChangeList)
468            changes.add(ce);
469      }
470      return this;
471   }
472
473   /**
474    * Overwrites the contents of the config file.
475    *
476    * @param contents The new contents of the config file.
477    * @param synchronous Wait until the change has been persisted before returning this map.
478    * @return This object.
479    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
480    * @throws InterruptedException Thread was interrupted.
481    */
482   public ConfigMap load(String contents, boolean synchronous) throws IOException, InterruptedException {
483
484      if (synchronous) {
485         final var latch = new CountDownLatch(1);
486         var listener = (ConfigStoreListener) x -> latch.countDown();
487         store.register(name, listener);
488         store.write(name, null, contents);
489         if (latch.await(30, TimeUnit.SECONDS)) {
490            store.unregister(name, listener);
491         } else {
492            throw new ConfigException("Unable to store contents of config to store.");
493         }
494      } else {
495         store.write(name, null, contents);
496      }
497      return this;
498   }
499
500   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
501   // Lifecycle events
502   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
503
504   /**
505    * Persist any changes made to this map and signal all listeners.
506    *
507    * <p>
508    * If the underlying contents of the file have changed, this will reload it and apply the changes
509    * on top of the modified file.
510    *
511    * <p>
512    * Subsequent changes made to the underlying file will also be signaled to all listeners.
513    *
514    * <p>
515    * We try saving the file up to 10 times.
516    * <br>If the file keeps changing on the file system, we throw an exception.
517    *
518    * @return This object.
519    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
520    */
521   public ConfigMap commit() throws IOException {
522      try (var x = lock.write()) {
523         var newContents = asString();
524         for (var i = 0; i <= 10; i++) {
525            if (i == 10)
526               throw new ConfigException("Unable to store contents of config to store.");
527            var currentContents = store.write(name, contents, newContents);
528            if (currentContents == null)
529               break;
530            onChange(currentContents);
531         }
532         this.changes.clear();
533      }
534      return this;
535   }
536
537   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
538   // Listeners
539   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
540
541   /**
542    * Registers an event listener on this map.
543    *
544    * @param listener The new listener.
545    * @return This object.
546    */
547   public ConfigMap register(ConfigEventListener listener) {
548      listeners.add(listener);
549      imports.forEach(x -> x.register(listener));
550      return this;
551   }
552
553   boolean hasEntry(String section, String key) {
554      var cs = entries.get(section);
555      var ce = cs == null ? null : cs.entries.get(key);
556      return ce != null;
557   }
558
559   /**
560    * Unregisters an event listener from this map.
561    *
562    * @param listener The listener to remove.
563    * @return This object.
564    */
565   public ConfigMap unregister(ConfigEventListener listener) {
566      listeners.remove(listener);
567      imports.forEach(x -> x.register(listener));
568      return this;
569   }
570
571   /**
572    * Returns the listeners currently associated with this config map.
573    *
574    * @return The listeners currently associated with this config map.
575    */
576   public Set<ConfigEventListener> getListeners() {
577      return u(listeners);
578   }
579
580   @Override /* ConfigStoreListener */
581   public void onChange(String newContents) {
582      ConfigEvents changes2 = null;
583      try (var x = lock.write()) {
584         if (Utils.ne(contents, newContents)) {
585            changes2 = findDiffs(newContents);
586            load(newContents);
587
588            // Reapply our changes on top of the modifications.
589            this.changes.forEach(y -> applyChange(false, y));
590         }
591      } catch (IOException e) {
592         throw asRuntimeException(e);
593      }
594      if (changes2 != null && ! changes2.isEmpty())
595         signal(changes2);
596   }
597
598   @Override /* Object */
599   public String toString() {
600      try (var x = lock.read()) {
601         return asString();
602      }
603   }
604
605   /**
606    * Returns the values in this config map as a map of maps.
607    *
608    * <p>
609    * This is considered a snapshot copy of the config map.
610    *
611    * <p>
612    * The returned map is modifiable, but modifications to the returned map are not reflected in the config map.
613    *
614    * @return A copy of this config as a map of maps.
615    */
616   public JsonMap asMap() {
617      var m = new JsonMap();
618      try (var x = lock.read()) {
619         imports.forEach(y -> m.putAll(y.getConfigMap().asMap()));
620         entries.values().forEach(z -> {
621            var m2 = mapOf(String.class, String.class);
622            z.entries.values().forEach(y -> m2.put(y.key, y.value));
623            m.put(z.name, m2);
624         });
625      }
626      return m;
627   }
628
629   /**
630    * Serializes this map to the specified writer.
631    *
632    * @param w The writer to serialize to.
633    * @return The same writer passed in.
634    * @throws IOException Thrown by underlying stream.
635    */
636   public Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
637      try (var x = lock.read()) {
638         for (var cs : entries.values())
639            cs.writeTo(w);
640      }
641      return w;
642   }
643
644   /**
645    * Does a rollback of any changes on this map currently in memory.
646    *
647    * @return This object.
648    */
649   public ConfigMap rollback() {
650      if (!changes.isEmpty()) {
651         try (var x = lock.write()) {
652            changes.clear();
653            load(contents);
654         } catch (IOException e) {
655            throw asRuntimeException(e);
656         }
657      }
658      return this;
659   }
660
661   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
662   // Private methods
663   //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
664
665   private void checkSectionName(String s) {
666      if (! ("".equals(s) || isValidNewSectionName(s)))
667         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid section name: '"+s+"'");
668   }
669
670   private void checkKeyName(String s) {
671      if (! isValidKeyName(s))
672         throw new IllegalArgumentException("Invalid key name: '"+s+"'");
673   }
674
675   private boolean isValidKeyName(String s) {
676      if (s == null)
677         return false;
678      s = s.trim();
679      if (s.isEmpty())
680         return false;
681      for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
682         var c = s.charAt(i);
683         if (c == '/' || c == '\\' || c == '[' || c == ']' || c == '=' || c == '#')
684            return false;
685      }
686      return true;
687   }
688
689   private boolean isValidNewSectionName(String s) {
690      if (s == null)
691         return false;
692      s = s.trim();
693      if (s.isEmpty())
694         return false;
695      for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
696         var c = s.charAt(i);
697         if (c == '/' || c == '\\' || c == '[' || c == ']')
698            return false;
699      }
700      return true;
701   }
702
703   private boolean isValidConfigName(String s) {
704      if (s == null)
705         return false;
706      s = s.trim();
707      if (s.isEmpty())
708         return false;
709      for (var i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {
710         var c = s.charAt(i);
711         if (i == 0) {
712            if (! Character.isJavaIdentifierStart(c))
713               return false;
714         } else {
715            if (! Character.isJavaIdentifierPart(c))
716               return false;
717         }
718      }
719      return true;
720   }
721
722   private void signal(ConfigEvents changes) {
723      if (Utils.isNotEmpty(changes))
724         listeners.forEach(x -> x.onConfigChange(changes));
725   }
726
727   private ConfigEvents findDiffs(String updatedContents) throws IOException {
728      var changes2 = new ConfigEvents();
729      var newMap = new ConfigMap(store, name, updatedContents);
730
731      // Imports added.
732      for (var i : newMap.imports) {
733         if (! imports.contains(i)) {
734            for (var s : i.getConfigMap().entries.values()) {
735               for (var e : s.oentries.values()) {
736                  if (! newMap.hasEntry(s.name, e.key)) {
737                     changes2.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, s.name, e.key, e.value, e.modifiers, e.comment, e.preLines));
738                  }
739               }
740            }
741         }
742      }
743
744      // Imports removed.
745      for (var i : imports) {
746         if (! newMap.imports.contains(i)) {
747            for (var s : i.getConfigMap().entries.values()) {
748               for (var e : s.oentries.values()) {
749                  if (! newMap.hasEntry(s.name, e.key)) {
750                     changes2.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
751                  }
752               }
753            }
754         }
755      }
756
757      for (var ns : newMap.oentries.values()) {
758         var s = oentries.get(ns.name);
759         if (s == null) {
760            for (var ne : ns.entries.values()) {
761               changes2.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, ns.name, ne.key, ne.value, ne.modifiers, ne.comment, ne.preLines));
762            }
763         } else {
764            for (var ne : ns.oentries.values()) {
765               var e = s.oentries.get(ne.key);
766               if (e == null || Utils.ne(e.value, ne.value)) {
767                  changes2.add(ConfigEvent.setEntry(name, s.name, ne.key, ne.value, ne.modifiers, ne.comment, ne.preLines));
768               }
769            }
770            for (var e : s.oentries.values()) {
771               var ne = ns.oentries.get(e.key);
772               if (ne == null) {
773                  changes2.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
774               }
775            }
776         }
777      }
778
779      for (var s : oentries.values()) {
780         var ns = newMap.oentries.get(s.name);
781         if (ns == null) {
782            for (var e : s.oentries.values())
783               changes2.add(ConfigEvent.removeEntry(name, s.name, e.key));
784         }
785      }
786
787      return changes2;
788   }
789
790   // This method should only be called from behind a lock.
791   private String asString() {
792      try {
793         var sw = new StringWriter();
794         for (var cs : entries.values())
795            cs.writeTo(sw);
796         return sw.toString();
797      } catch (IOException e) {
798         throw asRuntimeException(e);  // Not possible.
799      }
800   }
801
802   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
803   // ConfigSection
804   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
805
806   class ConfigSection {
807
808      final String name;   // The config section name, or blank if the default section.  Never null.
809
810      final List<String> preLines = synced(Utils.list());
811      private final String rawLine;
812
813      final Map<String,ConfigMapEntry> oentries = synced(map());
814      final Map<String,ConfigMapEntry> entries = synced(map());
815
816      /**
817       * Constructor.
818       */
819      ConfigSection(String name) {
820         this.name = name;
821         this.rawLine = "[" + name + "]";
822      }
823
824      /**
825       * Constructor.
826       */
827      ConfigSection(List<String> lines) {
828
829         String name2 = null, rawLine2 = null;
830
831         final int
832            S1 = 1, // Looking for section.
833            S2 = 2; // Found section, looking for end.
834
835         var state = S1;
836         var start = 0;
837
838         for (var i = 0; i < lines.size(); i++) {
839            var l = lines.get(i);
840            var c = StringUtils.firstNonWhitespaceChar(l);
841            if (state == S1) {
842               if (c == '[') {
843                  var i1 = l.indexOf('[');
844                  var i2 = l.indexOf(']');
845                  name2 = l.substring(i1+1, i2).trim();
846                  rawLine2 = l;
847                  state = S2;
848                  start = i+1;
849               } else {
850                  preLines.add(l);
851               }
852            } else {
853               if (c != '#' && l.indexOf('=') != -1) {
854                  var e = new ConfigMapEntry(l, lines.subList(start, i));
855                  if (entries.containsKey(e.key))
856                     throw new ConfigException("Duplicate entry found in section [{0}] of configuration:  {1}", name2, e.key);
857                  entries.put(e.key, e);
858                  start = i+1;
859               }
860            }
861         }
862
863         this.name = name2;
864         this.rawLine = rawLine2;
865         this.oentries.putAll(entries);
866      }
867
868      ConfigSection addEntry(String key, String value, String modifiers, String comment, List<String> preLines) {
869         var e = new ConfigMapEntry(key, value, modifiers, comment, preLines);
870         this.entries.put(e.key, e);
871         return this;
872      }
873
874      ConfigSection setPreLines(List<String> preLines) {
875         this.preLines.clear();
876         this.preLines.addAll(preLines);
877         return this;
878      }
879
880      Writer writeTo(Writer w) throws IOException {
881         for (var s : preLines)
882            w.append(s).append('\n');
883
884         if (! name.isEmpty())
885            w.append(rawLine).append('\n');
886         else {
887            // Need separation between default prelines and first-entry prelines.
888            if (! preLines.isEmpty())
889               w.append('\n');
890         }
891
892         for (var e : entries.values())
893            e.writeTo(w);
894
895         return w;
896      }
897   }
898
899   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
900   // Import
901   //---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
902
903   class Import {
904
905      private final ConfigMap configMap;
906      private final Map<ConfigEventListener,ConfigEventListener> listenerMap = synced(map());
907
908      Import(ConfigMap configMap) {
909         this.configMap = configMap;
910      }
911
912      synchronized Import register(Collection<ConfigEventListener> listeners) {
913         listeners.forEach(this::register);
914         return this;
915      }
916
917      synchronized Import register(final ConfigEventListener listener) {
918         var l2 = (ConfigEventListener) events -> {
919            var events2 = events.stream().filter(x -> ! hasEntry(x.getSection(), x.getKey())).collect(Collectors.toCollection(ConfigEvents::new));
920            if (!events2.isEmpty())
921               listener.onConfigChange(events2);
922         };
923         listenerMap.put(listener, l2);
924         configMap.register(l2);
925         return this;
926      }
927
928      synchronized Import unregister(final ConfigEventListener listener) {
929         configMap.unregister(listenerMap.remove(listener));
930         return this;
931      }
932
933      synchronized Import unregisterAll() {
934         listenerMap.values().forEach(configMap::unregister);
935         listenerMap.clear();
936         return this;
937      }
938
939      String getConfigName() {
940         return configMap.name;
941      }
942
943      ConfigMap getConfigMap() {
944         return configMap;
945      }
946
947      @Override
948      public boolean equals(Object o) {
949         return o instanceof Import ir && ir.getConfigName().equals(getConfigName());
950      }
951
952      @Override
953      public int hashCode() {
954         return getConfigName().hashCode();
955      }
956   }
957}
